name: Salvation (43iscoding)
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare ("Connected Worlds")

The mysterious void approaches our galaxy, devouring everything on its way. No one can fight it, so the only way to survive - escape. Achieve the salvation by setting up warp tunnels between planets to reach wormhole.

Click on planets to select and connect them with warp tunnels.

Keyboard shortcuts:

  • Space/Enter - Proceed
  • Escape - Go to main menu
  • R - Restart
  • M - Toggle mute

_________________________________________________________

Ludum Dare entry page: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=35110
